subtitle: About Me
content: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer, I finished my studies on Engineering at the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca. During my career, I worked with a wide variety of technologies - both frontend and backend. I spend a lot of time staying up to date with the latest technologies & trends. Also keeping an eye on open source. I think I add value to projects through my ability to resolve complex tasks while keeping the business side of things in mind.

subtitle: Experience
content: I started developing software in 2013. Since then, I worked with several companies on applications in different industries like benefits management, automotive, insurance, data management & data analytics. My main areas of expertise are Javascript, ReactJs, NodeJs, .Net Core and C#.

subtitle: Hire me
content:
Since 2019, I've been working as a freelancer / consultant. Here's what I can do for you:
  • Software development - as I love writing code, I would like to do it for you. I can help on big or small projects or start things from 0. I am used to working with teams both on-site or distributed around the globe.
  • Frontend Architecture & Setup - being one of my favorite things, I can set up frontend applications and do it right - using the best tools available & latest best practices.
  • Technical consultance - I can assist with a range of topics from software architecture to UI&UX, code quality, reviews, automated testing and CI/CD.
